mapper.insert:
insert into orders_main( PAYMENT, STATUS, TID, CREATE_TIME, TITLE, CREATED, BUYER_MESSAGE, BUYER_MEMO, RECEIVER_NAME, RECEIVER_STATE, RECEIVER_ADDRESS, RECEIVER_MOBILE, RECEIVER_PHONE, BUYER_NICK
)values( #{payment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
